title: Better Bee Model Texture Pack
briefDescription: This texture pack changes the bee model and textures! The models were made by me, same for the textures. Hope you enjoy, please don't steal ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
This texture pack changes the bee model and textures! The models were made by me, same for the textures. Hope you enjoy, please don?t steal any model or texture.
By Ftere
This pack didn?t took much to be made, i really hope you like It. The bee model was made by me on blockbench and it?s based on real life bees. The textures where made by me using blockbench. I posted the pack sooner on my discord server, there you can follow my projects, get help with my pack and obtain some permissions.
My discord server

title: Useful Textures 3.0
briefDescription: Is crying obsidian too messy? Is Blackstone hard to see? Do you want block destroying particles disabled? Here are some resource packs that may be ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Is crying obsidian too messy? Is Blackstone hard to see? Do you want block destroying particles disabled? Here are some resource packs that may be useful for all of those! They can all be downloaded in a combination pack or separated in multiple packs. The Particle Disabler is not included in the combination pack though. I hope this helps!
Here are all the blocks that are changed. pumpkin blur is disabled in this option too:
? Slime and honey are solid
? Crying Obsidian is a purple-ish version of regular obsidian.
? Netherrack, Nether gold ore, and Nether bricks have 50% higher brightness
? Blackstone is changed to dark variants of regular stone
? Random rotations are disabled for Netherrack, Obsidian variants, nether gold ore, Glowstone, nether wart blocks, warped wart blocks, dirt, snow, and lily pads
? Fire and Soul fire has the shape of a torch to be less distracting
Villagers have their haggling sounds and level badges disabled, and linking particles are adjusted. (hopefully, they only shoot 1 particle at a time now)
The crops have green flags on top of them to show that they are ready to be harvested. If you don?t want cocoa beans to be included let me know.
The wither related mobs should be easier to see in the dark areas
This is what a fortress would look like with this on, the wither skeleton skull item isn?t changed though.
A bastion would look like this based on the modified Blackstone textures

title: Amxicar?s Armor Tweaks
briefDescription: Amxicar's Armor Tweaks were created to suit my needs. I have good taste in armor so I created this texture to share with the internet.&...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Amxicar?s Armor Tweaks were created to suit my needs.
I have good taste in armor so I created this texture to share with the internet.
Highly inspired by the Light Armor Texture Pack, created by ShadowXX, I tweaked a few things to my likings.
This armor pack makes it so it shows more of the player but still looking armored as always.
Starting with Leather and Netherite, while the leather armor looks light and not too protective, the Netherite armor looks like a tank ready to be worn!

On the right side, the gold helmet has been replaced with a golden crown, and when the gold armor is fully equipped, it looks great with the Founders Cape!
The Diamond armor, holding some resemblance to the Netherite armor, has a belt on the back for aesthetic purposes while the gold armor has it on both sides.

title: Better Nether Wart (1.16+)
briefDescription: This is a texture pack for people who can't tell what stage the nether wart is in or annoyed when they break the nether wart ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
This is a texture pack for people who can?t tell what stage the nether wart is in or annoyed when they break the nether wart too early. There are 3 stages to this texture pack. Red for first stage, yellow for second stage, and green for final stage.
These are the three stages of nether wart:
Nether Wart: Stage One Red
Nether Wart: Stage Two Yellow

title: Dorifto Tofu Boat!
briefDescription: Are you a Boat Drifter or just a fan of Initial D? Sure you guys will like this texture pack. I present to you: Dorifto ...

crawledImageUrls.text: Are you a Boat Drifter or just a fan of Initial D? Sure you guys will like this texture pack. I present to you: Dorifto Tofu Boat! This is my first texture pack, hope you guys like it ?

This texture pack replaces texture of the Oak Boat. It was based on the Toyota AE-86 Trueno from Japanese Anime Initial D.
Side View

It comes with a black stripe and Japanese text vinyls that translate to Fujiwara Tofu Shop. Kinda cute actually :D
Front View

title: Beautiful Simplicity Textures
briefDescription: This is my first pack on MCPEDL. I hope everyone likes it. This pack adds beautiful textures but simple textures to the bedrock edition of ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
This is my first pack on MCPEDL. I hope everyone likes it. This pack adds beautiful textures but simple textures to the bedrock edition of the game. Don?t like extra details? This pack is for you. Don?t like detailed stone? This is the one. If you need to tell me anything about this Texture Pack, contact me through the comment section or you can email me at [email protected] This pack works on android. Tell me in the comments if it works on win10, and iOS.
You cannot distribute it anywhere on the internet without my permission. You are not allowed to modify this pack and publish it.
There are some bugs in the textures that Im trying to fix. Enjoy the textures!

title: Different Coloured Enchants (Red & Blue)
briefDescription: Are you getting bored of the normal minecraft enchants colour? This is a very simple texture pack that changes the enchanting glint colour to either ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Are you getting bored of the normal minecraft enchants colour? This is a very simple texture pack that changes the enchanting glint colour to either red or blue depending on your choice.
Adds the option to have either red or blue enchanting glint colours. To select either red or blue, go into the resource packs setting and click on the pack icon. Then click the gear settings icon on the right and swipe the slider to one or the other. Then, you must restart the game.
You may change this pack for personal use ONLY
You may not republish this pack and claim it as your own.
^Original
^Original

title: Light Armor Texture Pack
briefDescription: This pack is for people who want to see thier skin underneath their armor, without getting rid of the armor itself. You can still clearly ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
This pack is for people who want to see thier skin underneath their armor, without getting rid of the armor itself. You can still clearly see the armor while still being able to see your skin!
As you can see this is a very simple mod, but it makes armor look so much better! I only plan to do Iron, Gold, Diamond, and Netherite armor but if guys insist I?ll do the other ones as well! I?m open to suggestions! Screenshots:Diamond Armor:

title: KhuiiMC?s Custom Textures
briefDescription: This texture pack only changes a handful of things, including some blocks, mobs, paintings, and items. The main reason I made this texture pack was ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
This texture pack only changes a handful of things, including some blocks, mobs, paintings, and items. The main reason I made this texture pack was so my friends and I could use it on our survival world, but anyone else is free to equip this pack! This is my first custom texture pack, which is why some changes may not be the best and why I haven?t re-textured many things. Anyways, I hope you enjoy using my texture pack!
These are all of the block and item textures that I changed:
And here are the two mob textures that I changed:
I also changed two of the painting textures. One of them has to do with a joke my friends and I have, and the other is just a smiley face. All of the other painting textures remained the same.

title: Transparent Inventory for PvP (Clear Inventory Theme)
briefDescription: Do you find yourself dying to people a lot? This texture pack makes the survival inventory transparent and also adds a Java edition inventory menu ...

crawledImageUrls.text: Do you find yourself dying to people a lot? This texture pack makes the survival inventory transparent and also adds a Java edition inventory menu style. This helps with PvP as you can see if anyone is approaching you or if you are being attacked. I made it for Hive Treasure wars, but can be used in other Survival worlds/servers. This can help you from being caught by surprise and possibly help you win more games.

-This can help by making the inventory screen greyed out and translucent so you can see approaching players and be more aware of your surroundings. It increases the transparency to around 25%.
-It also changes the style of the squares in the inventory (not in the hotbar) to be more rounded:

briefDescription: This texture pack adds and recreates the old textures of the game before the update of textures that it had, for the new blocks, the ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
This texture pack adds and recreates the old textures of the game before the update of textures that it had, for the new blocks, the style of the old textures was taken into account to respect the essence of nostalgia
This texture has been reworked the following textures:
Blocks
Other features:

This parity feature works as follows:
You need to write in the chat /replaceitem entity [objective] slot.armor.head 0 [block]
Note: this feature just works with the following blocks:
The crimson and warped fungus bright in the night when it?s in the head
